upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10 
* Added a new value for parameter 24 (DC Motor mode) for the application with 3-speed fans/motors, so that only 1 relay can be turned on at the same time.
* Fixed setting bug: you can now set any value for parameters 2, 3, and 4 (input type) when parameter 24 (DC motor mode) is set to value 1 or 2 (enabled).
* Fixed a bug with the auto turn-off timer for R1, R2, and R3 whenever parameters 12, 13, and 14 are changed from value 1 to 0. Parameters 2, 3, and 4 values 0-10 were affected.
* Added new settings to set input trigger duration (parameters 28, 29, and 30,).
* Added new setting to assign fixed on or off actions to inputs (parameter 31).
